params.name: visitorId
params.doc: the participant the conversation belongs to

params.name: paging.limit
params.doc: The number of items to load

params.name: paging.cursor
params.doc: Cursor returned in last query response. Should not be provided on first page request

params.name: sort.fieldName
params.doc: Name of the field to sort by

params.name: sort.order
params.doc: Sort order (ASC/DESC). Defaults to ASC

docs.summary: get the messages of a visitor

params.name: visitorId
params.doc: the participant the conversation belongs to

params.name: paging.limit
params.doc: The number of items to load

params.name: paging.cursor
params.doc: Cursor returned in last query response. Should not be provided on first page request

params.name: sort.fieldName
params.doc: Name of the field to sort by

params.name: sort.order
params.doc: Sort order (ASC/DESC). Defaults to ASC

docs.summary: get the messages of a visitor

params.name: visitor.id
params.doc: the visitor id, contact id or any other id of the participant you are willing to connect with

params.name: visitor
params.doc: the participant to connect with

params.name: message
params.doc: The message to send

params.name: direction
params.doc: the direction of the message - whether it will be sent from the business to the visitor, or from the visitor to the business

params.name: messageOptions
params.doc: Options to adjust the behaviour of the message

docs.summary: send a message to a visitor

examples.title: Send Message Text
body:
curl -X POST \
    'https://www.wixapis.com/inbox/v1/615eaba9-1bf5-4c21-9107-713003e4e37d/messages' \
    -H 'Authorization: <AUTH>' \
    -H 'Content-Type: application/json' \
    -d '{"visitor":{"id":"615eaba9-1bf5-4c21-9107-713003e4e37d"},"message":{"payload":{"type":"PLAIN","plain":{"type":"TEXT","data":[{"text":"Hi! How are you doing?"}]}},"badges":[{"text":"my badge","visibility":"PRIVILEGED","image":"https:\/\/wix.com\/an-image.jpg"}]}}'

examples.title: Send Message Template
body:
curl -X POST \
    'https://www.wixapis.com/inbox/v1/615eaba9-1bf5-4c21-9107-713003e4e37d/messages' \
    -H 'Authorization: <AUTH>' \
    -H 'Content-Type: application/json' \
    -d '{"visitor":{"id":"615eaba9-1bf5-4c21-9107-713003e4e37d"},"message":{"payload":{"type":"TEMPLATE","summary":"New Store Order","template":{"title":"New Store Order","textLines":["Red shoes - $10"],"buttons":[{"label":"View Order","url":"link-to-order"}],"orientation":"PORTRAIT","image":"https:\/\/wix.com\/an-image.jpg"}},"badges":[]}}'

examples.title: Send Message Minimal
body:
curl -X POST \
    'https://www.wixapis.com/inbox/v1/615eaba9-1bf5-4c21-9107-713003e4e37d/messages' \
    -H 'Authorization: <AUTH>' \
    -H 'Content-Type: application/json' \
    -d '{"visitor":{"id":"615eaba9-1bf5-4c21-9107-713003e4e37d"},"message":{"payload":{"type":"MINIMAL","summary":"Incoming call","minimal":{"text":"Incoming call to your business line","image":"https:\/\/wix.com\/an-image.jpg","url":"https:\/\/wix.com\/a-link"}},"badges":[]}}'

examples.title: Send Message Form
body:
curl -X POST \
    'https://www.wixapis.com/inbox/v1/615eaba9-1bf5-4c21-9107-713003e4e37d/messages' \
    -H 'Authorization: <AUTH>' \
    -H 'Content-Type: application/json' \
    -d '{"visitor":{"id":"615eaba9-1bf5-4c21-9107-713003e4e37d"},"message":{"payload":{"type":"FORM","summary":"hello world!","form":{"title":"Quote Submission","description":"Visitor #1234 requested a quote!","fields":[{"name":"description","value":"Landing page"},{"name":"budget","value":"$1,000"}],"media":[{"image":{"id":"d881c5_9bacdb073944412283e509e9053bc096~mv2.jpg","fileName":"IMG_1717.JPG","width":200,"height":200,"mimeType":"uri\/image","url":"https:\/\/static.wixstatic.com\/media\/d881c5_9bacdb073944412283e509e9053bc096~mv2.jpg"}}]}},"silent":false,"badges":[]}}'

params.name: visitor.id
params.doc: the visitor id, contact id or any other id of the participant you are willing to connect with

params.name: visitor
params.doc: the participant to connect with

params.name: message
params.doc: The message to send

params.name: direction
params.doc: the direction of the message - whether it will be sent from the business to the visitor, or from the visitor to the business

params.name: messageOptions
params.doc: Options to adjust the behaviour of the message

examples.title: Send Message Text
body:
curl -X POST \

messages.name: _com_wixpress_chat_MessageSentToVisitorDomainEvent
messages.displayName: Message Sent To Visitor Domain Event Object

members.name: entityId
members.doc: MessageSentToVisitor ID associated with this event.

members.name: triggeredByAnonymizeRequest
members.doc: Whether this event was triggered as a result of a privacy regulation application (e.g., GDPR).

messages.name: _com_wixpress_chat_MessageSentToVisitorActionEvent
messages.displayName: Message Sent To Visitor Action Event Object

members.name: bodyAsJson
members.doc: Event body as a stringified JSON

messages.name: _com_wixpress_chat_MessageSentToBusinessDomainEvent
messages.displayName: Message Sent To Business Domain Event Object

members.name: entityId
members.doc: MessageSentToBusiness ID associated with this event.

members.name: triggeredByAnonymizeRequest
members.doc: Whether this event was triggered as a result of a privacy regulation application (e.g., GDPR).

messages.name: _com_wixpress_chat_MessageSentToBusinessActionEvent
messages.displayName: Message Sent To Business Action Event Object

members.name: bodyAsJson
members.doc: Event body as a stringified JSON

members.name: entityId
members.doc: ButtonInteracted ID associated with this event.

members.name: triggeredByAnonymizeRequest
members.doc: Whether this event was triggered as a result of a privacy regulation application (e.g., GDPR).

members.name: bodyAsJson
members.doc: Event body as a stringified JSON

members.name: url
members.doc: the url to open when clicking the button

members.name: label
members.doc: the text to display on the button

members.name: type
members.doc: Type of the button. Currently supported types are ACTION - use uri attribute and POSTBACK - use button_payload attribute to send interaction to app that created the button.

members.name: buttonPayload
members.doc: Payload to send to the app that created the button

members.name: appId
members.doc: AppID of the app that created the button.

members.name: interactionId
members.doc: Unique interaction id for the use of the application when button is interacted with.

members.name: limit
members.doc: The number of items to load

members.name: cursor
members.doc: Cursor returned in last query response. Should not be provided on first page request

members.name: fieldName
members.doc: Name of the field to sort by

members.name: silent
members.doc: for silent messages (e.g. activities) - can be used for not sending push notifications, expand the chat, etc

members.name: badges
members.doc: used for adding icons on a message. e.g. used in auto-messages to indicate a message is an auto-message, or sent from facebook

members.name: visibility
members.doc: controls whether it will be visible for everyone or just the business

members.name: isEphemeral
members.doc: indicates if this message should upgrade a chatroom from temporary to permanent (when true it wont upgrade)

members.name: sequence
members.doc: the incremental id of the message, for the most accurate sorting (i.e., if multiple messages are received at the same time stamp, they'll still have unique `sequence`.)

members.name: silent
members.doc: for silent messages (e.g. activities) - can be used for not sending push notifications, expand the chat, etc

members.name: badges
members.doc: used for adding icons on a message. e.g. used in auto-messages to indicate a message is an auto-message, or sent from facebook

members.name: isEphemeral
members.doc: indicates if this message upgraded the chatroom from temporary to permanent or not (when true it didn't)

members.name: summary
members.doc: a textual summary of the message - e.g. for images we send something like "Sent a photo"

members.name: plain
members.doc: simple messages - e.g. text messages, images, etc

members.name: minimal
members.doc: minimal activities - e.g. email campaign view

members.name: custom
members.doc:
custom messages - anything you want, but need to be implemented on the chat clients as well in order to render it appropriately

 TODO - This will be publicly exposed. Document that this is internal use only, possibly document available custom types in md.

members.name: data
members.doc: the message data, messages usually contain a single piece of a data, but multiple items can be sent and we will show them one-by-one

members.name: buttons
members.doc: list of buttons to show within the message

members.name: orientation
members.doc: controls the orientation of the message

members.name: textLines
members.doc: list of text lines to show within the message

members.name: url
members.doc: a url to open when clicking the activity

members.name: iconUrl
members.doc: the icon that will appear on the message

members.name: description
members.doc: text that will appear under the title

members.name: type
members.doc: the identifier of the message (e.g. my-custom-message)

members.name: name
members.doc: the name of the field (e.g. Age)

members.name: text
members.doc: the text that will be displayed

members.name: visibility
members.doc: controls whether it will be visible for everyone or just the privileged users (e.g. the business)

members.name: iconUrl
members.doc: the icon url of the badge

members.name: visitorId
members.doc: the participant the conversation belongs to

members.name: nextCursor
members.doc: the next cursor for pagination purposes, null if there's no more results

members.name: direction
members.doc: the direction of the message - whether it will be sent from the business to the visitor, or from the visitor to the business

members.name: messageOptions
members.doc: Options to adjust the behaviour of the message

members.name: message
members.doc: the message sent, along some additional information added by the server

members.name: visitorId
members.doc: the visitor the message relates to

members.name: id
members.doc: the visitor id, contact id or any other id of the participant you are willing to connect with

members.name: id
members.doc: the id of the channel, e.g. FACEBOOK

members.name: values
members.doc: the identifier of the visitor in this channel, e.g. for FACEBOOK - his Facebook ID

members.name: sendRealTime
members.doc: Whether to send realtime of MessageSent

members.name: action
members.doc: Details of the chat action performed - currently only button interaction is supported

members.name: actionType
members.doc: Type of action. Currently only ButtonInteraction is supported.

members.name: appId
members.doc: AppId of the application that created the button.

members.name: interactionId
members.doc: Unique ID of the given button's interaction.

docs.summary:
Possible values are:
  • PLAIN
  • TEMPLATE
  • MINIMAL
  • FORM
  • CUSTOM
  • SYSTEM

Possible values are:
  • TEXT
  • IMAGE
  • FILE

Possible values are:
  • PARTICIPANT_JOINED
  • PARTICIPANT_LEFT
  • DESCRIPTION_CHANGED

Possible values are:
  • EMAIL
  • FACEBOOK
  • SMS
  • WHATSAPP
  • PHONE
